title: Englewood Open Space Trail Easily Accessible! On-Site Playground!
posting_body: ['APARTMENTS IN ENGLEWOOD CO', 'Villas at Homestead located in Englewood, CO is in the coveted Homestead Neighborhood and Cherry Creek School District.', 'Our apartment homes are surrounded by beautiful open space and walking paths with lush landscaping.', 'Villas at Homestead Apartments is everything you are looking for, convenient to shopping and dining at Streets of Southglenn and the Denver Tech Center, and minutes from the Light Rail and I-25.', 'Each apartment home has large open kitchens with stainless steel appliances and separate dining rooms, walk in closets, custom cabinetry and countertops.', 'Each apartment home offers large open floorplans for your comfort.', 'Call Now:', 'show contact info', 'Use this link for more info:', '<URL>', 'This is a 2 Bedroom, 2 Bath, approximately 960 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'Features', '- Custom Cabinetry', '- Stainless Steel Appliances', '- Microwave', '- Separate Dining Area', '- Private Patio/Balcony', '- Ceiling Fans', '- Walk-In Closets', '- In-unit washer and dryer', '- Vaulted Ceilings', '- Fireplace', '- Open Layout', '- Linen Closet', '- Cable/Satellite', '- Vinyl Plank Flooring', '- Individual Climate Control', '- King-sized Bedroom', '- Central Heat and Air', '- Roman-style tub', '- Upgraded Kitchens Available', '- Garage', 'Community Amenities', '- Bike and Walking Paths', '- Courtyard', '- Clubhouse', '- Short Term Leases Available', '- Outdoor Pool and Spa', '- Playground', '- Easy Access to Freeways and Public Transportation', '- Laundry Center', '- Package Room', '- Additional Storage', '- Business Center', '- Tennis Court', '- Street View', '- Basketball court(s)', '- BBQ Area', 'Pet Policy', 'Villas at Homestead welcomes your pets with a deposit, pet fee and monthly pet rent.', 'Our homes accommodate up to two pets per home.', 'Please note some breed restrictions apply.', 'Office Hours', 'M - F: 9:00 am - 6:00 pm', 'S: 10:00 am - 5:00 pm', 'Villas at Homestead', '6857 South Homestead Parkway, Englewood, CO, 80112', 'Prices are subject to change, based on availability and qualification of the applicant, additional fees may apply.', 'yNcZ5XNkL4k']
